00028 #ifndef ABSTRACTCELLBASEDTESTSUITE_HPP_
00029 #define ABSTRACTCELLBASEDTESTSUITE_HPP_
00030 #define CXXTEST_ABORT_TEST_ON_FAIL
00031 
00032 #include "SimulationTime.hpp"
00033 #include "RandomNumberGenerator.hpp"
00034 #include "TissueConfig.hpp"
00035 #include "CellMutationStateRegistry.hpp"
00036 
00042 class AbstractCellBasedTestSuite : public CxxTest::TestSuite
00043 {
00044 protected:
00045 
00049     void setUp()
00050     {
00051         //The following won't work.  It returns from this setup method, but not the test suite
00052         //EXIT_IF_PARALLEL; // defined in PetscTools
00053 
00054         SimulationTime::Instance()->SetStartTime(0.0);
00055         RandomNumberGenerator::Instance()->Reseed(0);
00056         TissueConfig::Instance()->Reset();
00057         CellMutationStateRegistry::Instance()->Clear();
00058     }
00059 
00063     void tearDown()
00064     {
00065         SimulationTime::Destroy();
00066         RandomNumberGenerator::Destroy();
00067     }
00068 };
